original_text: And he was teaching them and saying to them, “Is it not written, ‘My house shall be called a house of prayer for all the nations’? But you have made it a den of robbers.”
korean_text: 이에 가르쳐 이르시되 기록된 바 내 집은 만민이 기도하는 집이라 칭함을 받으리라고 하지 아니하였느냐 너희는 강도의 소굴을 만들었도다 하시매

sentences.original_text: ‘My house shall be called a house of prayer for all the nations’?
sentences.korean_translation: 내 집은 모든 민족을 위한 기도의 집이라 불리리라’?

sentences.original_text: But you have made it a den of robbers.”
